title: Slow cooker Kashmiri butter chicken
ingredients: ['2 red onions', '1 (2.5cm/1 in) piece peeled fresh root ginger', '1 red chilli', '4 cloves garlic', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '600g skin on, bone-in chicken portions (e.g. thighs)', '25 butter or ghee', '200g button mushrooms, quartered', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon ground paprika', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '4 green cardamom pods, cracked', '300ml chicken stock', '2 tablespoons tomatoe puree', '1 pinch brown sugar', '6 tablespoons natural yoghurt or double cream', '1 (400g) tin butter beans', 'rice or naan (or both!) to serve']
